location_preferences.notes: Location is not a constraint; remote or onsite is fine.

seniority_preferences.notes: Open to junior and mid-level roles unless the job clearly requires high years of experience or senior/lead titles.

cloud_and_deployment: Azure AI Services (AI Foundry, AI Search, WebApps)

focus.notes: No single fixed focus area. Prioritize matching based on technical skills, relevant experience, and role/title alignment.

experience.summary: Hands-on experience in machine learning and LLM-based systems through academic projects, applied research, and industry collaboration. Strong Python and applied AI background.

work_history.title: Master Thesis Student
highlights: Designed and implemented a persona-based RAG chatbot prototype to support exploration and analysis of customer personas for stakeholders.
Generated synthetic customer personas using prompting techniques.
Presented and documented research findings and demo to Volvo CE engineers.

work_history.title: AI Research & Development Intern
highlights: Conducted data collection and preprocessing from expert interviews and articles.
Designed and built an AI coaching app using RAG to support athletes.
Tested with multiple LLMs and evaluated their performance manually.

highlights: Resolved technical issues for AZDMS, achieving a 98% SLA resolution rate.
Installed, upgraded, and configured IBM FileNet P8 on Linux.
Applied Agile methodologies to manage CPI across global FileNet installations.

education.institution: Mangalore Institute of Technology and Engineering

projects.name: Warehouse Robotics Path Optimization using Q-Learning
highlights: Trained a Q-learning RL model for autonomous warehouse navigation on a 15×15 grid with real-time GUI.

primary_match_signals: Role title aligns with target_roles OR job responsibilities clearly align with AI/ML/LLM work
Strong overlap with core skills (Python, ML, LLM/RAG, cloud AI)
Job responsibilities fit applied AI/ML/LLM system building

negative_filters.reason: Avoid jobs requiring high experience compared to current early-career level.
Avoid roles that are clearly senior-level even if years are not explicitly stated.

llm_instruction_focus: Prioritize technical skill match, relevant experience match, and target title alignment.
If the job is clearly AI/ML/LLM-related but the title is unusual, still consider it.
Reject roles that demand high years of experience or senior/lead responsibility.
De-prioritize buzzwords and vague claims; prefer concrete requirements and responsibilities.
